name: Dungeon of Cards - Prototype
description:
If the game will receive sufficient support (both "emotionally" and financially) i will make this into a full game! 

What will i add you ask?

  • New classes. The Wanderer is the only class at the moment, but i will add the Rogue and the Sorcerer, each with unique game mechanics and new active cards. (90% complete, just not in the prototype cos of bugs + money. the artist, who is making these amazing card illustrations is gotta eat too...).
  • New room types and sizes.
  • New unique enemy types.
  • New and improved UI (the current version was made by using free assets).
  • A shop system, where you can use your gold and unlock the new cards/rooms.
  • Music, sounds, animations.
Card illustrations:
